name: ∞ days out, a breaking bad fangame
name_original: ∞ days out, a breaking bad fangame
description:
cook, make and sell you baby blue in this mobile and desktop app

COOK!

sell and make baby blue while you talk to Jeese to get food, ingredients, and more!

SELL!

don't let the DEA catch you or run out of food (not yet in game)

BUY!

buy resources to become the kingpin of your dreams

(note this game is in development, credits to ChatGPT for code because i am a coding noob, and Sketchfab, for helping me find the RV and Jeese model)

models:

RV: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/fleetwood-bounder-breaking-bad-85ea7208651a47f6a...

Jeese: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/jesse-pinkman-3d-model-by-ko6i-de1c423c492544e0a...

i dont own the Breaking bad IP, i am making no money off of this!

made with Linux, the open source operating system!
